subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] banning spam
msgSnippet: Hi Paige and others We at the Shavian group have been having the same trouble as you... only difference is, we can t ban anyone! The moderator vanished. So
messageBody:
Hi Paige and others
 
We at the Shavian group have been having the same trouble as you... only difference is, we can't ban anyone! The moderator vanished. So we're in the process of creating a privately hosted mailing list that will be spammer-proof - list@.... Might be an idea to consider that option at some point...
 
Hugh B
----- Original Message -----
From: Paige Gabhart
To: Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, July 01, 2004 11:13 PM
Subject: [Read_Alphabet] banning spam

Dear Suebee:
 
The Interest-rate spammer has been banned!  I fear this may become like the boy trying to hold back the ocean with his finger in the dike.  It would be satisfying if spammers were to be hit with significant penalties such as large fines for screwing up the utility of the internet.  They're like a plague of locusts in their fecundity.
 
 
Paige Gabhart
